sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE ID = #memberId#
SELECT NICK FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE NICK = #memberNick#

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM( SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS CNT FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,WORD_TITLE,T.MEMBERNO FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN TRADEBOARD B ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = B.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO = M.MEMBERNO ) A WHERE 1=1 AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND MEMBERNO = #sNo#
UNION ALL
SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS CNT FROM TRADEBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON B.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE B.MEMBERNO =#sNo# AND
T.TRADE_STATUS_NO >=2 AND T.TRADE_STATUS_NO1 =2
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
)

SELECT NO,TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TRADE_NO DESC) AS NO,TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM (SELECT TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,ESCROW_WHETHER, TO_CHAR(TRADE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS TRADE_DATE FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN TRADEBOARD B ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = B.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON T.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE I.MEMBERNO =#sNo#
AND B.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%' ) UNION ALL
SELECT TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS, TO_CHAR(TRADE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM TRADEBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON B.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE B.MEMBERNO =#sNo# AND
AND B.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%' AND
T.TRADE_STATUS_NO >=2 AND T.TRADE_STATUS_NO1 =2) ) )A
WHERE A.NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS CNT FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,B.MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE FROM TRADEBOARD B INNER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON B.MEMBERNO =M.MEMBERNO ) A WHERE 1=1
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND MEMBERNO = #sNo#

SELECT NO,TRADE_NO,MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE,TRADE_WORD_NO,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE ,TRADE_BOARD,ID,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM(
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T.TRADE_NO DESC) AS NO, TRADE_NO,B.MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE,B.TRADE_WORD_NO,S.TRADE_STATUS,B.TRADE_BOARD,M.ID,T.ESCROW_WHETHER, TO_CHAR(TRADE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS TRADE_DATE FROM TRADEBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO =M.MEMBERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO WHERE 1=1
AND B.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = 1 OR T.TRADE_STATUS_NO =2 AND B.MEMBERNO = #sNo# )A
WHERE NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT TOTAL_M-TOTAL_B AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT SUM(CHARGE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_M,MEMBERNO FROM SANIPANIMONEY WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo# GROUP BY MEMBERNO)
T LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT SUM(EXCHANGE_PRICE)AS TOTAL_B,MEMBERNO FROM SANIPANIMONEY WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo#

AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'

SELECT AUCTIONWORDNO,STARTBUYPAY,WORDCONTENT,ID,NO,BIDPRICE_NO,BIDPRICE,AUCTIONNO ,ENDDATE,TRADESTATUSNO,ESCROWWHETHER,TRADE_STATUS FROM ( SELECT A.AUCTIONWORDNO,STARTBUYPAY,WORDCONTENT,ID,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.AUCTIONWORDNO DESC) AS NO,BIDPRICE_NO,BIDPRICE,AUCTIONNO ,TO_CHAR(ENDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS ENDDATE,TRADESTATUSNO,ESCROWWHETHER,TRADE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AUCTIONWORDNO ORDER BY BIDPRICE DESC) AS BIDPRICE_NO ,AUCTIONWORDNO,MEMBERNO,TRADESTATUSNO,BIDPRICE,AUCTIONNO,ESCROWWHETHER FROM AUCTION ) A INNER JOIN AUCTIONBOARD B ON A.AUCTIONWORDNO =B.AUCTIONWORDNO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON A.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO INNER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON A.TRADESTATUSNO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO AND A.BIDPRICE_NO = 1 WHERE A.BIDPRICE_NO = 1 AND A.AUCTIONWORDNO IN (SELECT AUCTIONWORDNO FROM AUCTION WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo# )
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND TRADESTATUSNO = 5
AND TRADESTATUSNO = 6
)A WHERE NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
